Design Details episode 81, live at Etsy

Bryn Jackson and Brian Lovin run Design Details, an interview podcast with designers. They came to Etsy to do a recording of a panel-style interview with me, Justin Edmond, and Joel Califa. It was super fun but a little scaryâ€”it was recorded in front of a live audience! I had a ton of fun talking about things like how we all became designers, management vs. individual contributor roles, and Neopets.

Listen here: http://spec.fm/podcasts/design-details/21184

Jessica Harllee is a product designer at Etsy in Brooklyn, an avid crafter, and an amateur writer.
